mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rnum,s.sto_name,s.sto_addr,s.sto_phone,s.sto_open,s.sto_close from stores s,(select sto_num from bookmark where mem_num=#{mem_num})b where s.sto_num=b.sto_num) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select * from bookmark where sto_num=#{sto_num} and mem_num=#{mem_num}
select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from bookmark where mem_num=#{mem_num}
